parse.title: The Lord of the Rings: Legends of Middle-earth

wikitext.*:
{{expansion}}
'''''The Lord of the Rings: Legends of Middle-earth''''' was an app-based game inspired by ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]''. It was released on 16 October 16, 2014, and permanently shut down on 10 March 10, 2016.
